00003         function select($name, $values, $default_value, $params = array())
00004         {
00005                 $params_serialized = "";
00006                 foreach($params as $key => $value)
00007                 {
00008                         $params_serialized .= " $key=\"" . htmlentities($value) . "\"";
00009                 }
00010                 $options = "";
00011                 foreach ($values as $value => $title)
00012                 {
00013                         $value = htmlentities($value);
00014                         $selected = $value == $default_value ? ' selected="selected"' : '';
00015                         $options .= <<<EOT
00016                 <option value="{$value}"{$selected}>{$title}</option>
00017 
00018 EOT
00019 ;
00020                 }
00021                 $html = <<<EOT
00022         <select name="{$name}"{$params_serialized}>
00023         {$options}
00024         </select>
00025 EOT
00026 ;
00027                 return $html;
00028         }

00033         function block_tag($tagname, $content, $params = NULL)
00034         {
00035                 $params_serialized = "";
00036                 if (!empty($params))
00037                 {
00038                         foreach ($params as $key => $value)
00039                         {
00040                                 $params_serialized .= " $key=\"$value\"";
00041                         }
00042                 }
00043                 $html = <<<EOT
00044 <{$tagname}{$params_serialized}>
00045         {$content}
00046 </{$tagname}>
00047 
00048 EOT
00049 ;
00050                 return $html;
00051         }
00052 
00053         function inline_tag($tagname, $content, $params = NULL)
00054         {
00055                 $params_serialized = "";
00056                 if (!empty($params))
00057                 {
00058                         foreach ($params as $key => $value)
00059                         {
00060                                 $params_serialized .= " $key=\"" . htmlentities($value) . "\"";
00061                         }
00062                 }
00063                 $html = <<<EOT
00064 <{$tagname}{$params_serialized}>{$content}</{$tagname}>
00065 EOT
00066 ;
00067                 return $html;
00068         }

00070         function leaf_tag($tagname, $params = NULL)
00071         {
00072                 $params_serialized = "";
00073                 if (!empty($params))
00074                 {
00075                         foreach ($params as $key => $value)
00076                         {
00077                                 $params_serialized .= " $key=\"$value\"";
00078                         }
00079                 }
00080                 $html = <<<EOT
00081 <{$tagname}{$params_serialized} />
00082 EOT
00083 ;
00084                 return $html;
00085         }

00091         function a($content, $params)
00092         {
00093                 if (isset($params['query_string']))
00094                 {
00095                         $params['href'] .= "?{$params['query_string']}";
00096                         unset($params['query_string']);
00097                 }
00098                 if (isset($params['hash']))
00099                 {
00100                         $params['href'] .= "#{$params['hash']}";
00101                         unset($params['hash']);
00102                 }
00103                 return inline_tag('a', $content, $params);
00104         }

00107         {

00155         function button($name, $value, $params = array(), $enabled = TRUE)
00156         {
00157                 $params['name'] = $name;
00158                 $params['value'] = $value;
00159                 $params['type'] = 'button';
00160                 if (!$enabled)
00161                 {
00162                         $params['disabled'] = 'disabled';
00163                 }
00164                 return leaf_tag('input', $params);
00165         }
00166         
00167         function checkbox($name, $checked, $params = array(), $enabled = TRUE)
00168         {
00169                 $params['name'] = $name;
00170                 $params['type'] = 'checkbox';
00171                 if ($checked)
00172                 {
00173                         $params['checked'] = 'checked';
00174                 }
00175                 if (!$enabled)
00176                 {
00177                         $params['disabled'] = 'disabled';
00178                 }               
00179                 return leaf_tag('input', $params);
00180         }
